body.section:
This page contains all functional and nonfunctional requirements.
manage project members
metadata like phone number, department, role, competence may be added to a person.
send messages to other project members
read messages
data version conflicts must be resolved between project members. If conflict occur, the application notifies the user and provides tools and help to manually resolve the conflict.
The networking and synchronisation functionality are interfaces with mock-ob implementations. Only user interaction for conflict resolving will be implemented.
Data may be tagged with metadata and organised in categories by various keywords.
Data used in the application remains usable from outside the application.
A list of files (not necessarily the files themselves) is available even if the application is offline.
changes in local data are propagated (half)automatically to all other project members.
Every change made to a file has a comment, a time-stamp and a hash.
The user may choose between automatic or manual push/pull.
It is not required to configure and run a central server to fully use the application. Setting up the application is easy even for users with minor computer experience.
The application will run on the Windows, Linux and Mac plattform.
The application must not corrupt data under any circumstances.
Using the application can be learned quickly and easily.
The application is largely self-explenatory.
